T02D2213:194a-1: a'a rya n'i l'a mbara dhara badzra pa'i ni s'a dha no pi ka t'i ka n'a ma /
T02D2213:194a-3: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi
T02D2213:194a-4: sgrub thabs kyi man ngag rgya cher bshad pa'i 'grel
T02D2213:194a-5: ba / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2213:194a-6: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo skems mdzad pa //
T02D2213:194a-7: mthu ldan bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid de //
T02D2213:194a-8: nyi zla lta bur 'gro don mdzad pa'i mchog /
T02D2213:194a-9: sman mchog rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2213:194a-10: rang bzhin rig pa stong pa chen po dang //
T02D2213:194a-11: gnyug ma bde ba snying rje chen po dang //
T02D2213:194a-12: bde ba chen po mtha' 'bral rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2213:194a-13: phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin 'bras bu dngos //
T02D2213:194a-14: de nyid thob pa'i lam ni yod dang med pa yi //
T02D2213:194a-15: phyag rgya bzhi po lam gyis grol ba'i //
T02D2213:194a-16: de bzhin stong ba'i rang bzhin chen po ni //
T02D2213:194a-17: stong pa bdag med lam gyis grol zhes gsungs //
T02D2213:194a-18: de bzhin tshogs lam sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang //
T02D2213:194a-19: mthong lam sgom lam mthar phyin lam gyis ni //
T02D2213:194a-20: gnas ba'i ye shes byang chub ngo bo'i lam //
T02D2213:194a-21: thob cing grol bar kha cig de skad gsung //
T02D2213:194a-22: da ni rtsa ba'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02D2213:194a-24: kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs kun //
T02D2213:194a-25: sgron mes gsal phyir sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2213:194a-26: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la gus btud de //
T02D2213:194a-29: sems pa'i bag chags kyis skye ba gcig nas gcig tu len pa'i phyir 'gro ba'o //
T02D2213:194a-30: sems can ni nyon mongs pa'i yid can te /
T02D2213:194a-31: kun gzhi rnam par shes ba can skye 'jig gi chos can no //
T02D2213:194a-32: mun pa ni rdul dang mun pa snying stobs la sogs te /
T02D2213:194b-0: mthong bas spang ba'i nyon @194b mongs pa /
T02D2213:194b-1: bsgom pas spang ba'i nyon mongs pas kun nas dkris te bcings pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-2: mthong ba ni las dang las kyi 'bras bu mi shes ba ste ma rig pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-3: kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs ni /
T02D2213:194b-4: dang po nas sgo kun nas shes pa la /
T02D2213:194b-5: rtsa ba'i nyon mongs dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis dkris pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-6: sgron mes gsal ba'i phyir ni /
T02D2213:194b-7: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gsang sngags 'di nyid de /
T02D2213:194b-8: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa la sogs pa zag pa zad pa ni gsal bar bstan pa'i sgron ma'o //
T02D2213:194b-9: sgrub pa'i thabs pa'i thabs ni 'grub pa dang grub par byed pa ste don thob pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-10: dpal ldan ni yon tan rnam pa gnyis te rgyu dang 'bras bu las grub cing thob pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-11: rdo rje ni don rtags mtshon pa gsum ste /
T02D2213:194b-12: stong pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
T02D2213:194b-13: de'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gnas pa ni 'dzin cing 'chang pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-14: btud pa ni gzhung bkra shis shing mdzes pa dang 'jug pa ste /
T02D2213:194b-15: lus ngag yid kyi yon tan gsum dang ldan pa'i yi dam lha la dad pas 'dud ces so //
T02D2213:194b-16: bla ma brgyud pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D2213:194b-17: klu yi byang chub nyid kyis rim bzhin bshad //
T02D2213:194b-18: ces pa ni blo gros rin chen la sogs la
T02D2213:194b-19: sogs kyi man ngag gi rim pa'i don rnams bshad
T02D2213:194b-21: rigs rnams 'os su grub pa yi //
T02D2213:194b-22: sngags pa yon tan kun ldan pas //
T02D2213:194b-23: zhes pa rigs rnams ni rin po che'i rigs kyi gang zag go //
T02D2213:194b-24: 'os su grub pa ni dad pa gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-25: sngags pa ni don bzhi shes pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-26: yon tan kun ldan pa ni /
T02D2213:194b-27: mnor bar dbang rnams thob cing dam tshig sdom pa dang ldan te lam gnyis shes pa'o //
T02D2213:194b-28: yid 'ong bkra shis bde gnas su //
T02D2213:194b-29: zhes pa ni yid 'ong bkra shis ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas bkra shis pa ste /
T02D2213:194b-30: byang skyob shar ri dma' ba lho gzhol nub dgye ba ste /
T02D2213:194b-31: mdun nas phyogs sngo ba dang /
T02D2213:194b-33: 'jig rten rnams kyis ma smad pa //
T02D2213:194b-34: de yi gnas su legs 'dug ste //
T02D2213:194b-35: yang na tshogs tsam sogs pa la //
T02D2213:194b-36: nyams dga'i sa phyogs bde gnas so //
T02D2213:194b-37: bla med rgyu ru rab gnas na //
T02D2213:195a-0: snying gar nyi la h'um bzhag @195a * //
T02D2213:195a-3: bla med rgyud rab gnas ni thog mar sems bskyed gnyis dang 'brel ba'o //
T02D2213:195a-4: snying gar nyi la h'um bzhag ste ni /
T02D2213:195a-5: nang gi khrus nam mkha' lta bu dang /
T02D2213:195a-6: h'um las rang 'dod pa'i lha ru grub pa'o //
T02D2213:195a-7: de la snying gar nyi ma'i steng du h'um gnas pa'o //
T02D2213:195a-8: byin brlabs bltas te bka' bsgo la //
T02D2213:195a-9: 'od kyis bgegs la thog rnams dbab //
T02D2213:195a-10: bhr'um gyi tshig dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2213:195a-11: zhes pa la byin brlabs ni /
T02D2213:195a-12: snying ga spyi bo mgrin par bsgom pa ye shes bstim pa'o //
T02D2213:195a-13: ltas de ni thugs rje dang ldan pa'i sngags mig gis phyogs kun du blta zhes so ;
T02D2213:195a-15: rgyug zhig ma 'dug shig /'dir mthu ldan gyi khang pa yin no zhes par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2213:195a-16: 'od kyi bgegs la thog rnams dbab ni sa sbyong
T02D2213:195a-17: ba rnams la sa bon gyi 'od dkyil 'khor la
T02D2213:195a-18: phog ste / 'khor lo la sogs pa'i thog lnga dbab pa'o //
T02D2213:195a-19: bhrum gyi tshig dang yang dag ldan ni //
T02D2213:195a-20: tsakra aom bh'um h'um sva bh'um ha bh'um aa bh'um /
T02D2213:195a-21: thog la yang nas yang du phab ste bsgral ba'o //
T02D2213:195a-23: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang //
T02D2213:195a-24: me yi khang pa yongs su dbu ba //
T02D2213:195a-26: dzva la ram yang yongs su brjod //
T02D2213:195a-27: ces pa h'um las 'od zer ni rang gi nyi
T02D2213:195a-28: ma 'bar ba'i h'um las 'od zer la ha ljang
T02D2213:195a-29: gu kha dog sna tshogs pa phyogs bcur 'phros te
T02D2213:195a-30: / rdo rje khang pa phyogs mtshams su kha dog dkar po la sogs pa ldar gyur te /
T02D2213:195a-32: 'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i khyad lo'i khang pa drug pa ste /
T02D2213:195a-33: aom badzra tsakra h'um h'um zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2213:195a-34: ral gri ni mda' dang mtshon cha'i khang pa ste /
T02D2213:195a-35: badzra na ha na zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2213:195a-36: me yi khang pa yongs su dbu ba ni /
T02D2213:195a-37: me'i khang pa shin tu thams par grub pa badzra dzva lar zhes pa dang 'brel lo //
T02D2213:195a-38: g-yas pa'i ram dang g-yon pa'i aa //
T02D2213:195a-41: bsrung ba grub nas bgegs gsos pa ma gsos na snying rje dang bral ba yin pa phyir /
T02D2213:195a-42: g-yas pa'i ram dang ni mig g-yas pa'i rab rib
T02D2213:195a-43: kyi sdig pa bsregs te snying rje dang 'brel to
T02D2213:195a-44: // g-yon pa'i aa ni g-yon pa'i aas kun gzhi
T02D2213:195b-0: gsos te @195b gsod pa'i dogs pa dang bcas pas
T02D2213:195b-2: bgegs gsos 'byer bar 'gyur zhes pa dang 'brel lo //
T02D2213:195b-3: rgyud 'os gyur gyur nas rang byung gi / de 'od las byung nyid dkyil du //
T02D2213:195b-4: slob dpon sangs rgyas bcas spyan drangs //
T02D2213:195b-5: blang ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin la //
T02D2213:195b-6: zhes pa rgyud 'os gyur nas ni nyi ma'i h'um
T02D2213:195b-7: las 'od zer 'phros te ma lus pa'i sems can
T02D2213:195b-8: la bsdu ba bzhi'am mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul
T02D2213:195b-9: gyis don byas ye shes pa'i thugs kar thim /
T02D2213:195b-10: de nyid drangs te rgyud la phog pas sgrib pa rnams dag pa'o //
T02D2213:195b-11: dper na shel gyi kha dog dangs pa lta bur gyur pa'o ;
T02D2213:195b-12: / rang byung gi ni gdan thog tu h'um srog gi tshul du gnas pa de'i //
T02D2213:195b-13: de 'od las byung ni sa bon las 'od 'phros te /
T02D2213:195b-14: slob dpon sangs rgyas dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2213:195b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang spyan dangs pa'o //
T02D2213:195b-16: de rnams la nyid dkyil du zhes pas gdan nyi ma padma dang seng ge rnams la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2213:195b-17: bla ma mi bskyod gzugs 'dzin la ni 'od zer
T02D2213:195b-18: gyi 'phro 'dus mi bskyod pa'i rnam par bzhugs pa'o
T02D2213:195b-19: // phyag 'tshal phyi nang bzhi yis mchod //
T02D2213:195b-20: sdig pa bshags nas sdom pa bzung //
T02D2213:195b-21: yi rang bskul dang gsol gdab pa //
T02D2213:195b-22: bsdo dang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed de //
T02D2213:195b-24: phyag 'tshal ni gsum ka tshogs pa'i pa'am //
T02D2213:195b-26: phyi nang bzhi yis mchod pa ni //
T02D2213:195b-27: phyi ni rdza sa dang lha mo dang //
T02D2213:195b-28: dbul ba'i gnas tha dad du mchod pa'o //
T02D2213:195b-29: nang gi lha mo rnams kyi rang gi rdzas rang rang gcig tu nges pa'o //
T02D2213:195b-30: gsad ba ni lha mo'i mchod pa gsang bas mnyes pas gsang ba'o //
T02D2213:195b-31: de gsum ka phyag rgya chen por rtogs pa ni bla na med pa'o //
T02D2213:195b-32: rdog pa bshags ni gsum la gsum gyis gsum po
T02D2213:195b-33: so so rang rang gu du mi 'chab cing 'gyod
T02D2213:195b-34: pa dang bcas pas bshags shing dam 'cha' ba'o //
T02D2213:195b-35: de nas rgyud dag pa'i rjes na sdom pa bzung
T02D2213:195b-36: ba ni spyi dang khyad par te blangs pa'i don
T02D2213:195b-37: las phyir 'da' ba ste rigs drug gi sdom pa
T02D2213:195b-39: yi rang ni spyi dang khyad par te bla na
T02D2213:195b-40: med pa'i lam las lhag pa gzhan yod pa ma
T02D2213:196a-0: yin te / khyad par gyi don bskul ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo @196a * //
T02D2213:196a-1: bskor ba ste spyi dang bye brag go //
T02D2213:196a-2: gsol ba gdab pa ni mya ngan las 'da' ba mi mnga' yang gdul bya'i don du snang ste /
T02D2213:196a-3: de'i don du gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D2213:196a-4: bsngo dang ni 'bras bu khyad par can du bya'i phyir bsngo ba ste /
T02D2213:196a-5: byang chub tu yan lag bdun pa bsngo ba'o //
T02D2213:196a-6: skyabs 'gro ni phyi'i lha yongs su bcad de khyad
T02D2213:196a-7: par 'phags pa gos sngon po can la bdag nyid
T02D2213:196a-8: 'dud cing skyabs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2213:196a-9: sems bskyed ni gnyi ga'i stobs kyis 'khor ba las
T02D2213:196a-10: grol te lam bskyod la 'bras bu byang chub thob
T02D2213:196a-11: par byed pa'i blo can no //
T02D2213:196a-12: de ni lam khyad par can du sbyang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2213:196a-13: ste zhes pa lhag pa'i don te /
T02D2213:196a-14: bsod nams kyi tshogs der ma zad de tshad med pa yang yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2213:196a-15: de rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'grub par byed pa'i rgyu'i don no //
T02D2213:196a-16: tshad med bzhi po yongs su bskyed //
T02D2213:196a-18: byams nga snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi rim
T02D2213:196a-19: pas bsgom pa ste yul la tshad med pa'i phyir
T02D2213:196a-20: dge ba la tshad med pa'i sbrul ba'i sku'i nus
T02D2213:196a-21: pa'o // rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams pa kun //
T02D2213:196a-22: thams cad yongs su dag pa las //
T02D2213:196a-23: zhes pa ni mos pa'am sh'u n+ya t'a'i sngags kyi stobs kyi rgyu dang nang sems can dang ;
T02D2213:196a-24: mi rgyu phyi smod kyi 'jig rten rnam pa kun /
T02D2213:196a-25: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa thams cad yongs su dag pa stong par grub pa'o //
T02D2213:196a-26: sbos pa dang bral bas chos ku'i rgyu'i don no //
T02D2213:196a-27: rgyu gsum dang tshogs gnyis las 'brus bu 'grub pa'o //
T02D2213:196a-28: las ni rgyu mtshan gyi don te /
T02D2213:196a-29: tshogs gnyis tshogs pa las 'byung zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2213:196a-31: gzhal yas lam ldan rab tu bcas //
T02D2213:196a-32: grub bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2213:196a-33: ka ba brgyad dang rin chen mdzes //
T02D2213:196a-34: dra ba dra phyed pha gu dang //
T02D2213:196a-35: dar dpyangs rta babs rnams dang ldan //
T02D2213:196a-36: zhes pa ni rdo rje bsrung ba la sogs pa
T02D2213:196a-37: blo'i bye brag gis dag pa stong pa ste grub
T02D2213:196a-39: tha ma'i blo la dang po yod pa'i blo brtan
T02D2213:196a-40: pa'i khang pa gong gi rkyen gyis mi g-yo ste
T02D2213:196a-41: gnas pa'o // rang byung ni stong pa'i ngang las so //
T02D2213:196a-42: sngags bskyed ni lam ldan zhes te /
T02D2213:196b-1: gang 'byung ba ste 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rlung chu gsar gyis gzhi dang /
T02D2213:196b-2: lhun po rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin //
T02D2213:196b-3: gzhal yas lam ldan rab tu bcas ni /
T02D2213:196b-4: de steng bh'um las gzhal yas khang pa rin po
T02D2213:196b-5: che lnga las grub pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o
T02D2213:196b-6: // gru bzhi ba tshad med bzhi dang ldan /
T02D2213:196b-7: sgo bzhi pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang ldan //
T02D2213:196b-8: ka ba brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan /
T02D2213:196b-9: rin chen ni rin po che lnga las grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2213:196b-10: mdzes 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi mchod pas mdzes pa ste /
T02D2213:196b-12: / dra ba shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pa'o //
T02D2213:196b-13: dra phyed nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'o //
T02D2213:196b-14: pha gu ldan te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2213:196b-15: dar dbyangs ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D2213:196b-16: rta babs ni phyogs kyi rtag babs bzhi yang dag
T02D2213:196b-17: par spangs pa bzhi rnams dang ldan ni phyi nang
T02D2213:196b-18: gi rgyan rnams tshogs par grub pa'o //
T02D2213:196b-19: dur khrod brgyad kyi nye bar grub pa ste /
T02D2213:196b-20: dur khrod brgyad ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam mtshon pa'i don to //
T02D2213:196b-21: shing dang mchod rten dang lha dang klu dang srin dang /
T02D2213:196b-22: phyogs kyi bdag po rnams dang ce sbyang dang /
T02D2213:196b-24: ro gsar rnying gi rnam par rtog pa dang rgyu ba med pa'o //
T02D2213:196b-25: seng ge 'khor lo zla ba'i gdan //
T02D2213:196b-28: nyi zla padma ro yi gdan //
T02D2213:196b-29: nyon mongs mgo bo gnon pa dang //
T02D2213:196b-30: rnam kun ma lus gcod pa dang //
T02D2213:196b-31: thabs dang shes rab zung du ldan //
T02D2213:196b-32: nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa //
T02D2213:196b-33: rnam rtog thams cad rab tu bcom //
T02D2213:196b-34: de steng h'um las rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2213:196b-35: de las dpal ldan gnyis kyi bdag / nyon mongs kun sel gtum po'i gzugs //
T02D2213:196b-37: de steng gi gdan de rnams kyi thog tu'o //
T02D2213:196b-38: h'um las zhes pa 'od zer gyis las gnyis byas te /
T02D2213:196b-40: yang gnyis kyi las byas te /
T02D2213:196b-41: de las dpal ldan gnyis kyi bdag ni //
T02D2213:196b-42: mchog thun mong gi bdag por snang ba'o //
T02D2213:196b-43: nyon mongs kun sel ni mthong bas spang ba dang bsgom pas spang ba rnams so //
T02D2213:197a-2: spang bya phyir rgol ba rnams la gtum po'o //
T02D2213:197a-3: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la brgyan //
T02D2213:197a-4: mthing ga gos sngon sku la gsol //
T02D2213:197a-5: rdo rje dril bu lag na thogs //
T02D2213:197a-6: thun mong las dang rjes mthun no //
T02D2213:197a-7: mchog kyang thogs pa med par ro //
T02D2213:197a-8: sbrul bzhis lus la rnam par brgyan //
T02D2213:197a-9: spyan dmar mche gtsigs sbrul nag za //
T02D2213:197a-10: rin chen dpa' bo'i chos kyis brgyan //
T02D2213:197a-11: brkyang bsku ma khro bo brjid pa'i zhal //
T02D2213:197a-12: gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs pa can //
T02D2213:197a-14: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dbu la brgyan pa ni phung
T02D2213:197a-15: lnga dag pas rigs lnga de ye shes lnga'i ngo
T02D2213:197a-17: mthing gar gnas pa ni don stong pa nyid la 'gyur ba med pa'o //
T02D2213:197a-18: gos sngon sku la gsol ba ni rigs 'dzin pa ste dar ljang gu'i kha chag can no //
T02D2213:197a-19: rdo rje ni lag g-yas na thogs te thabs kyi
T02D2213:197a-20: rang bzhin rtse lnga la khyud lnga dang sa bon
T02D2213:197a-21: bkod pa'o // g-yon dril bu thogs te shes rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02D2213:197a-22: thun mong las dang rjes mthun ni /
T02D2213:197a-23: thun mong gtso bor bsgrub pa la phyag mtshan gdul bya'i dbang gi skabs dang sbyar ro //
T02D2213:197a-24: mchog kyang thogs pa med par ro ni /
T02D2213:197a-25: mchog gtsor sgrub pa la zung du 'brel pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2213:197a-26: sbrul bzhis lus la rnam par brgyan ni //
T02D2213:197a-27: rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze dmangs rigs rnams //
T02D2213:197a-28: kha dog ser po dmar po dkar po dang //
T02D2213:197a-29: nag po zhabs grub la sogs byas pa'o //
T02D2213:197a-30: spyan dmar ba ni sems can la thugs rjes chags pa'o //
T02D2213:197a-31: che ba gtsigs pa ni bdud bzhi dang sdang ba
T02D2213:197a-32: 'dul ba ste don byed pa'i rtags sbrul nag za
T02D2213:197a-33: ba ni nyon mongs pa'i gzug pa mjoms ['joms] pa'o
T02D2213:197a-34: // rin chen dpa' bo'i chos kyis brgyan ni //
T02D2213:197a-35: rin po che'i rgyan dang dpa' bo'i chas kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2213:197a-36: brkyang bsku ma ni don gnyis mdzad pa'o //
T02D2213:197a-37: khro bo brjid pa'i zhal ni khro chags gnyis kyi tshul gyis don mdzad pa'o //
T02D2213:197a-38: gsum khyim che ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zab pa'i don no //
T02D2213:197a-39: 'jigs pa can ni gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'o //
T02D2213:197a-40: de gsal mdun du ye shes dgug //
T02D2213:197a-41: bgegs bsal mchod dang gtor mas mnyes /
T02D2213:197b-0: de gsal mdun du ni @197b dam tshig pa rags
T02D2213:197b-1: pa dang phra ba gsal ba'i mdun du ye shes
T02D2213:197b-2: pa dgug ste h'um gi 'od kyis 'og min gyi
T02D2213:197b-3: gnas nas ye shes pa'i lha rnams dgug ces pa'o
T02D2213:197b-4: // badzra sa manta dza: zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2213:197b-5: bgegs bsal ni ye shes pa dang lhan cig pa'i bgegs rnams bskrad pa ste ;
T02D2213:197b-6: aom badzra yaksha h'um phat ces pas 'byer bar byed pa'o //
T02D2213:197b-7: phyin ci log gi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir gsung gi tha snyad tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2213:197b-10: mchod dang gtor mas mnyes ni phyag sngon du byas te dngos sam mchod pa yid kyis dbul pa'o //
T02D2213:197b-11: gzhan yang mchod pas mnyes par bya ba'o //
T02D2213:197b-12: de nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2213:197b-13: ae ma ho dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02D2213:197b-14: lus kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2213:197b-15: ye shes thugs rje chen po'i ngang //
T02D2213:197b-16: bdag lus ye shes kur byin rlobs //
T02D2213:197b-18: tshig gnyis su dag dang yid la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2213:197b-19: de nas sku gsung thugs gnas su //
T02D2213:197b-22: bsdus shing bsregs te sbyong ba las //
T02D2213:197b-23: ye shes gsum ni gnas su gnas //
T02D2213:197b-24: zhes pa ni gsol ba gdab pa'i rjes de nas
T02D2213:197b-25: sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su yig 'bru gsum ste
T02D2213:197b-27: de gsum las 'od byung nas mi sdug ste lus
T02D2213:197b-28: kyi sngom mam sdig pa'i gzugs su yig 'bru dag
T02D2213:197b-29: gi kam nag por yid kyis gzugs te /
T02D2213:197b-30: yid kyi 'od dpung nag po'i gzugs su snying gar bsdu'o //
T02D2213:197b-31: de rnams snying gar bsreg pa'o //
T02D2213:197b-32: spyi bor sbyar te bskur ba'o //
T02D2213:197b-33: 'od zer gyi rtsal gyi la so //
T02D2213:197b-34: gnas gsum du rigs kyi lha gsum grub ste /
T02D2213:197b-35: de yang ye shes gsum ni gnas su ste /
T02D2213:197b-36: rang grang gi rigs la ye shes pa'i lha ba bstims pa'o //
T02D2213:197b-37: ye shes rigs lngas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2213:197b-38: dbang bskur mi bskyod rigs lngas brgyan //
T02D2213:197b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya aa bhi
T02D2213:197b-40: shi nytsa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dag yongs su
T02D2213:197b-41: dag par byas te zhes pa ni /
T02D2213:197b-42: bla mas rig sngags gsol ba gdab //
T02D2213:197b-43: ye shes rig sngags byin brlabs te //
T02D2213:198a-0: dbang bskur gsol ba gdab pa @198a * //
T02D2213:198a-2: / aom la sogs pa brjod pa'o //
T02D2213:198a-3: dbang bskur zhes ni gsungs pa ste //
T02D2213:198a-4: rigs lnga shar nas chu yi dbang //
T02D2213:198a-5: zhe sdang rnam par sel ba dang //
T02D2213:198a-6: me long ye shes rgyud la gnas //
T02D2213:198a-7: lho nas dbu rgyan dbang bskur bas //
T02D2213:198a-8: ser sna rnam par sel ba dang //
T02D2213:198a-9: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gnas //
T02D2213:198a-10: nub nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D2213:198a-11: 'dod chags rnam par sel ba dang //
T02D2213:198a-12: so so thar pa'i ye shes gnas //
T02D2213:198a-13: byang nas dril bu'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D2213:198a-14: phrag dog sgrib pa sel pa dang //
T02D2213:198a-15: bya ba nan tan ye shes gnas //
T02D2213:198a-16: dbus su ming gi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2213:198a-17: ma rig mun pa sel ba dang //
T02D2213:198a-18: chos dbyings ye shes gnas pa'o //
T02D2213:198a-19: de la rtags dang rgyas gdab ni //
T02D2213:198a-20: mi bskyod rigs lngas brgyan pa ste //
T02D2213:198a-21: mi bskyod gtso bor gnas pa'o //
T02D2213:198a-22: lus kyi dri ma rnam par sbyang //
T02D2213:198a-23: dag yongs su dag par bya ste zhes pa /
T02D2213:198a-24: gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu blang //
T02D2213:198a-25: rigs lnga yab yum snyoms par zhugs //
T02D2213:198a-26: thugs rje chen po'i rang du zhu //
T02D2213:198a-27: thig le a'a: dang h'um rnams la //
T02D2213:198a-28: aa bhi shi nytsas sbyin par bya //
T02D2213:198a-29: aa ho su khas lces blangs la //
T02D2213:198a-30: dag las gyur pa'i dri ma rnams //
T02D2213:198a-31: thams cad dag ste nus mthu can //
T02D2213:198a-32: dbyangs dang rdo rjer gyur pa'o //
T02D2213:198a-33: thun mong gtso bo gnyis pos grub //
T02D2213:198a-34: gzhan rnams mos pa tsam nyid do //
T02D2213:198a-35: mchog la rdzogs par blang bar gsungs //
T02D2213:198a-36: sems ni yongs su dag bya ste //
T02D2213:198a-37: don gyis gnas par shes par bya //
T02D2213:198a-38: lha mo 'di yang mtshan nyid ldan //
T02D2213:198a-39: lag pas bzung ste gsol ba btab //
T02D2213:198a-40: dag pa bzhi yi dbye ba las //
T02D2213:198a-41: gnyis med ye shes gnas pa'o //
T02D2213:198a-42: de nas yan lag drug gis bskyed //
T02D2213:198a-43: bzhi pa phyag rgya chen por gnas //
T02D2213:198a-44: gsang sngags bzlas so zhes pas dbang gi rjes de nas sngags bzlas pa'o //
T02D2213:198a-45: gsal ba rnam gnyis rags dang phra //
T02D2213:198a-46: bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam pa la gsal bar byed pa de nyid do zhes pa ni /
T02D2213:198a-47: gsal ba rnam gnyis rags dang phra na rags pa
T02D2213:198a-48: gsal ba gtso bo gsal ba ste sku mdog dang
T02D2213:198a-50: phra ba gsal ba ni sems dpa' sum brtsegs gsal ba'o //
T02D2213:198b-0: bdag @198b ni bdag lhar gsal ba /
T02D2213:198b-1: gzhan gyi rnam pa ni gzhal yas khang dang bsrung ba gsal ba'o //
T02D2213:198b-2: gsal bar bsgom pa de nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2213:198b-3: rgyud rnams sbyong ba'i bzlas pa ni //
T02D2213:198b-4: rags pa dang ni phra ba'o //
T02D2213:198b-5: rangs pa gnyis te ba thag dang //
T02D2213:198b-6: ba thag med do gnyis ka la //
T02D2213:198b-7: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma'i tshul //
T02D2213:198b-8: phra ba'ang gsum du byung ba ni //
T02D2213:198b-9: h'um bskul sreg pa ram yin te //
T02D2213:198b-10: lte bar bskur ba spyi bo aa //
T02D2213:198b-12: dri ma sbyong ba'i bzlas pa la //
T02D2213:198b-13: rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste //
T02D2213:198b-14: rags pa dus mnyam gdon la sogs //
T02D2213:198b-15: phra ba rim pas bya ba'o //
T02D2213:198b-16: rags pa la zlos lugs gnyis te //
T02D2213:198b-17: ba thag yod pa ni lus ngag yid kyi skud
T02D2213:198b-18: pa 'brel pa'i tshul du dus mnyam du snying ga
T02D2213:198b-19: nas sngom mam sdig ba'am yi ge 'od dpung du
T02D2213:198b-20: 'don pa ste / sarba pa'i bam au tsa ta ya zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2213:198b-21: de rnams ma lus lte bar ram la sems bsreg te /
T02D2213:198b-22: da ha dzva la ram zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2213:198b-23: thal ba ma lus pa spyi bo nas ham dkar pos chu rgyun phab ste /
T02D2213:198b-24: sarba b'a bam shuddho& am tsa ta ya zhes pa dang 'phrel to //
T02D2213:198b-25: ba thag med pa ni 'od kyi skud pa sbrel ba ma yin te /
T02D2213:198b-26: 'od zer gyis lus dag yid kyi las dang pa rnams 'byed pa ste /
T02D2213:198b-27: nor bu chu 'thung ba bzhin no ;
T02D2213:198b-28: / gnyi ga la ste rags pa dang phra ba
T02D2213:198b-29: gnyis ga la tshul 'di nyid de mgal la bar
T02D2213:198b-30: mchad pa'o // phreng ba yig 'bru la 'od zer gnas pa'o //
T02D2213:198b-31: nyi ma ni 'od zer lus yongs la khyab pa'o //
T02D2213:198b-32: phra ba'ang gsum du byung ba ni dus mnyam yin te re mos rim gyis gsum 'byung ba'o ;
T02D2213:198b-33: / h'um bskul sreg pa ram yin te /
T02D2213:198b-34: lte ba bkur ba spyi bo aa ni lus kyi snying gnas sngom gyi gzugs su bton /
T02D2213:198b-35: lte bar ram las bsreg spyi bo aas brku ba'o //
T02D2213:198b-36: ngag gi kam nag po ru yid kyi 'od dbung
T02D2213:198b-37: du gdon pa dang sreg pa dang bkru ba rim
T02D2213:198b-38: gyis so // mtshan ma 'dod pa'i bzlas pa la //
T02D2213:198b-39: rnam pa lngar ni 'dir ma byas //
T02D2213:198b-41: mtshan ma bsnyen pa skyel pa'i bzlas pa la //
T02D2213:198b-42: gzhan dag na rnam par lngar bshad pa yod de /
T02D2213:198b-44: snying gar bskor ro mtshan ma 'byung //
T02D2213:198b-45: ba thag gzings dang dmigs pa med //
T02D2213:199a-2: ram dang h'um las me byung bas //
T02D2213:199a-3: zhes pas khyad par gyi don te //
T02D2213:199a-5: bsnyen pa ni snying gar bskor ro mtshan ma 'byung zhes ba'i don te /
T02D2213:199a-6: grangs kyis bsnyen pa skyel 'dod na //
T02D2213:199a-7: 'bum tsho gcig dang gnyis dang gsum ;
T02D2213:199a-8: / gsum dang bdun dang bye ba'o //
T02D2213:199a-9: snyigs ma'i dus su nyi shu ste //
T02D2213:199a-10: gsum la re re spyi ru gcig / de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D2213:199a-11: rtsa ba'i sngags la gtso bor bskyal //
T02D2213:199a-12: snying nang ye shes sems dpa'i yi //
T02D2213:199a-13: rdo rje h'um las bskor ba ste //
T02D2213:199a-14: mgal me breng nga nyi ma'i tshul //
T02D2213:199a-17: ba thag gzings dang dmigs pa med ces pa'i don te /
T02D2213:199a-18: thugs ka'i h'um las 'od zer 'og man du ye
T02D2213:199a-19: shes pa la phog ste mchod pas tshur 'dus te
T02D2213:199a-20: ye shes kyi byin rlabs bstim pa'o //
T02D2213:199a-21: aom badzra tsan ta ma h'a ao sha na h'um phat /
T02D2213:199a-22: aom r'a dza ma h'a ga ru da h'um h'um h'um 'di rnams bzlas pa'i don te /
T02D2213:199a-25: zhes pa ni bsgrub pa'i las ston pa'o //
T02D2213:199a-26: sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te dgug la ye
T02D2213:199a-27: shes pa la 'od zer gyis mchod nas mnyes te
T02D2213:199a-28: / de nas 'od zer gnyis byung bas las ngan
T02D2213:199a-29: pa dang sgrib pa dang nus mthu rnams dmar pos
T02D2213:199a-30: / bsreg pa'o // nyi ma rnams dkar pos 'grub pa'o //
T02D2213:199a-31: sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags dang 'byin pa'i sngags dang bcu gcig pa dang lnga pa'o //
T02D2213:199a-32: 'di yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2213:199a-33: da ni sgrub pa chen po las brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2213:199a-34: ram dang h'um las me byung bas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2213:199a-35: sems dpa' sum brtsegs kyi rdo rje'i lte ba'i h'um dmar nag dang /
T02D2213:199a-36: lte ba'i ram las me 'bar te /
T02D2213:199a-37: sor gcig gam gnyis sam khur gang la sogs pa 'phros te /
T02D2213:199a-38: mi shin tu drag cing rtsub pa myur ba che ba'i rang bzhin can /
T02D2213:199a-39: de rnams smin gyi lus bag chags ngan pa nyon
T02D2213:199a-40: mongs pa can gyi yid bgegs kyi gdon sems nus
T02D2213:199a-41: mthu las kyi sgrib pa rnams bsreg pa'o //
T02D2213:199a-42: 'od 'og min du 'phros pas bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje me'i phung por 'dus nas /
T02D2213:199a-43: de rnams me gnyis bsreg pa'o //
T02D2213:199b-0: sngags bzlas pas @199b kyang me'i rang bzhin du byung ste bsreg pa'o //
T02D2213:199b-1: ngag gi sngags bzlas pa yang /
T02D2213:199b-2: gzung ring gtso bor bya ste /
T02D2213:199b-3: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'u phat /
T02D2213:199b-4: ka sta stam gu li tsa la na sarba be
T02D2213:199b-5: tsa a'a ma dza n'a n'a ga m'a ra ya
T02D2213:199b-6: phat / ha pa aom pa khri aom r'a dza ma h'a ga ru da h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2213:199b-7: yang na zlos pa dang skor bzlog tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2213:199b-8: de ltar bsregs te rnam par byang ba'i sems nyid las /
T02D2213:199b-9: ye shes lus su gsal bar snang //
T02D2213:199b-11: gtso bo dang phyag g-yon pa'i bya khyung dang gnyis
T02D2213:199b-12: tha mi dang pa lha'i ngo bo me'i rnam par
T02D2213:199b-13: grub pa'o // thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes la /
T02D2213:199b-14: lha dang sngags 'di rnams kyis ngan song las sgrol bar 'gyur /
T02D2213:199b-15: nad kyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur /
T02D2213:199b-16: gnod pa'i bgegs la 'chi snyam pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung /
T02D2213:199b-17: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub ma lus pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2213:199b-18: sngags rnams kyi gzhan du nad dang sdug bsngal thams
T02D2213:199b-19: cad byang bar gyur cig sv'a h'a h'um phat ces
T02D2213:199b-20: btags shing sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2213:199b-21: de ni mtshan ma 'dod pa'o 'byung ste /
T02D2213:199b-22: grub rtags thon pa'i rtags gsum las //
T02D2213:199b-23: 'od sgra sku ston sgyu ma dang //
T02D2213:199b-24: zhes pa ni rtags rnam pa gsum 'byung ste /
T02D2213:199b-25: lha grub pa gos sngon po gon ba me tog
T02D2213:199b-26: sngon po thu ba nyi zla'i steng na 'dug pa
T02D2213:199b-27: la sogs pa'o // sdig pa dang nad thon rtags
T02D2213:199b-28: ni lus las mi gtsang ba la sogs pa dang
T02D2213:199b-29: la sogs pa'o // / rnag khrag la sogs pa 'byung ba'o //
T02D2213:199b-30: rtags gsum pa ni sdig sbrul la sogs bsreg cing 'tshod pa'o //
T02D2213:199b-31: dngos su 'byung ba'i mtshan ma ni 'od kyi phung po'am /
T02D2213:199b-35: lha'i sgra'am chos ston pa'i sgra'o //
T02D2213:199b-36: sprul ba la sku gcig gi zhal mthong ba'am /
T02D2213:199b-38: dpag tu med pa'i zhal mthong ba 'byung ste /
T02D2213:199b-39: tha ma dang 'bring dang rab tu 'byung ba'o ;
T02D2213:199b-40: / de lta bu'i rnam pa byung yang /
T02D2213:199b-41: bden pa'i dngos por gang yang grub pa med de /
T02D2213:199b-42: gang zhig yod par rtog pa yang //
T02D2213:199b-43: 'di yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D2213:199b-44: gang zhig med par rtog pa yang //
T02D2213:199b-45: 'di yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D2213:199b-46: gang zhig gnyi gar rtog pa yang//
T02D2213:200a-0: @200a * // 'di las sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D2213:200a-1: rtogs dang brtags par bya ba dag / gnyis su bzung na bdud kyi las //
T02D2213:200a-2: rnam par snang ba sems nyid de //
T02D2213:200a-3: gang du yang ni grub pa med //
T02D2213:200a-5: de tshe gnyis dang ldan nam mi ldan yang rung
T02D2213:200a-6: ste bsod nams kyi las tshogs dang gtor ma la
T02D2213:200a-7: sogs pa bya'o // dga' ba'am mi dga' ba'i sems sgyu ma'i blos bzlog pa'o //
T02D2213:200a-8: de rjes sangs rgyas lung ston 'byung //
T02D2213:200a-10: de la mkha' 'gro rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par byed do //
T02D2213:200a-11: sbrul pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas mang pos lung ston to //
T02D2213:200a-12: zhing khams 'di zhes bya bar 'khor dang gdul bya
T02D2213:200a-13: dang bstan pa 'di srid gnas so zhes ton par
T02D2213:200a-14: 'gyur ro // grogs ni khrus dang sreg dang tshe //
T02D2213:200a-16: tshogs dang sbyin sreg gsad pa dang //
T02D2213:200a-17: tsha tsha gtor ma la sogs pa //
T02D2213:200a-19: de nas gser la sogs pa 'grub //
T02D2213:200a-20: ces pa ni bskyed rdzogs kyi grogs bstan pa yin te /
T02D2213:200a-21: khrus ni phyi dang nang ngo //
T02D2213:200a-23: rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
T02D2213:200a-24: thams cad sel par byed do //
T02D2213:200a-25: sred pa ni nang gi sbyin sreg ting nge 'dzin gyis sdig pa bsreg pa ste grogs so //
T02D2213:200a-26: tshe ni phyi'i tshe bsring ba'i las kun bya ba dang //
T02D2213:200a-27: nor spel ba lha rnams thos bu brten te spel ba'o //
T02D2213:200a-28: nang gi tshe rin po che'i ga'u'i nang du gnas bcas te brtan par bya'o //
T02D2213:200a-29: bdud rtsi ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang 'brel pa ste /
T02D2213:200a-31: klog 'don ni bka'i rgyun 'brum kha thon nam glegs
T02D2213:200a-32: bam la tshul bzhin du klog / kun chub par
T02D2213:200a-34: mandala ni bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la dbul pa'i rin pa'o //
T02D2213:200a-35: tshogs ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2213:200a-37: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i ston mo bya'o //
T02D2213:200a-38: sbyin sreg ni phrin las bzhi'i sbyin sreg ste dngos grub bzhi sbyin sreg go //
T02D2213:200a-39: gsad par byed pa'i rgyu gsan pa'i //
T02D2213:200a-40: bla ma dang dkon mchog gi sku dgra rnams mngon
T02D2213:200b-0: spyod kyi las brtsams pas te snying rje'i @200b bsam
T02D2213:200b-1: pa dang ldan pas gsad pa'o //
T02D2213:200b-2: tsha tsha ni sku gsung thugs kyi rten pa bzhengs pa'o //
T02D2213:200b-3: gtor ma ni phyi nang du shes par bya'o //
T02D2213:200b-4: sogs pa'i don ni las bcu dang bsod nams kyi las so //
T02D2213:200b-5: 'di yang grogs su 'gro ba yin te /
T02D2213:200b-6: dngos grub gnyis thob par byed la gtso bo ma yin yang 'di rnams bskyed du 'gyur te /
T02D2213:200b-7: nyams su blang ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D2213:200b-8: de rnams ldan na gser la sogs pa 'grub ste /
T02D2213:200b-9: thun mong gi dngos grub brgyad 'grub bo //
T02D2213:200b-10: yum lcang lo can gyi rgyud las /
T02D2213:200b-11: ri lu rkang myongs mig sman dang //
T02D2213:200b-12: gter dang dgra bo tshar gcod dang //
T02D2213:200b-13: gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyis len //
T02D2213:200b-14: ral gri 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad //
T02D2213:200b-15: bzlas pa tshogs dang gro mas 'grub //
T02D2213:200b-17: mchod 'dod pa yi sems can gyis //
T02D2213:200b-18: zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ston pa yin te /
T02D2213:200b-19: mchod 'dod pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'o //
T02D2213:200b-20: sems can ni rigs dang ldan pa gang zag de gtso bor grub pa'o //
T02D2213:200b-21: thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo dang //
T02D2213:200b-22: snying nang sbyor ba gsum gyi rtsa //
T02D2213:200b-23: thig le thig le yi ges mtshan //
T02D2213:200b-24: dbus su thabs dang shes rab 'bar //
T02D2213:200b-25: thig le ye shes gsal bar 'bar //
T02D2213:200b-27: thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo bzhi ni spyir bor mgrin snying lte ba bzhi /
T02D2213:200b-29: 'og ma gnyis po shes rab ste //
T02D2213:200b-30: gong ma thabs su yang dag bshad //
T02D2213:200b-31: aa wa dh'u t'i dbus gnas te //
T02D2213:200b-32: la la n'a dang ras n'a //
T02D2213:200b-33: g-yas dang g-yon du gnas ba'o ;
T02D2213:200b-34: / snying po'i tshul du gnas pa'o //
T02D2213:200b-35: rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T02D2213:200b-36: bcu drug pa dang de yi phyed //
T02D2213:200b-37: drug cu rim gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D2213:200b-38: theg li thig le yang dag mtshan ni 'khor lo dbye ba de rnams la /
T02D2213:200b-39: a'a li nyis 'gyur rkyang pa dang //
T02D2213:200b-40: sde tshan brgyad du yang dag gnas ;
T02D2213:200b-41: / k'a li nyis 'gyur rnam dbyes mtshan //
T02D2213:200b-42: g-yas pa'i rtsa na a'a li ste //
T02D2213:200b-43: g-yon pa nyid na k'a li'o //
T02D2213:200b-44: thig le 'khyags pa'i tshul du gnas //
T02D2213:200b-45: snying dbus su thabs dang shes rab 'bar ni /
T02D2213:200b-46: snying nang nyi zla'i bar du ni //
T02D2213:201a-0: a'a li thig le ye shes gsal bar bsams ni ham @201a * //
T02D2213:201a-1: a'a:aom h'um gi yi ge ni //
T02D2213:201a-2: thig le'i tshul du gnas pa ste //
T02D2213:201a-3: thig le gsal ba ye shes rgyu //
T02D2213:201a-4: de la ye shes brtags pa'o //
T02D2213:201a-5: au ma dbyings nas sprul pa ru //
T02D2213:201a-6: ye shes gsal ba dbyings la thug / de tshe mi gnas bsam dang bral //
T02D2213:201a-8: dbu ma dbyings nas sprul pa ru //
T02D2213:201a-9: 'og gi lam gyi gnas su ni //
T02D2213:201a-10: rlung sngon kha dog rnam lnga bskyed //
T02D2213:201a-11: gtum mo'i me ni rab tu bus //
T02D2213:201a-12: rtsa gsum nang na yar la zhugs //
T02D2213:201a-14: gsal zhing zhu bas bde chen 'byung //
T02D2213:201a-15: ye shes gsal ba dbyings la thug ni 'od zer tshangs pa'i gnas nas 'phros //
T02D2213:201a-16: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2213:201a-17: ye shes thig le'i rnam pa bkug / gnas su zhugs nas gnyis med 'dres //
T02D2213:201a-18: de tshe mi gnas bsam bral 'byung //
T02D2213:201a-19: de ltar du ni bsgoms pa la //
T02D2213:201a-20: phyag rgya chen po skye ba ste //
T02D2213:201a-21: bsam dang rtog pa'i yul las 'das //
T02D2213:201a-22: tshig dang sgra yi yul las 'das //
T02D2213:201a-23: gang du yang ni mi gnas so //
T02D2213:201a-24: 'gro ba'i dbang po gang dang gang gi rtsa //
T02D2213:201a-25: kha phye steng du thig le bsam //
T02D2213:201a-28: dbang po gang dang gang gi rtsa //
T02D2213:201a-29: dbang po lnga po gang yang rung //
T02D2213:201a-30: gzugs sgra de bzhin yul rnams la //
T02D2213:201a-31: 'dzin par byed pa'i rtsa rnams la //
T02D2213:201a-33: dbang po yul dang yul can gnyis //
T02D2213:201a-34: de gnyis thig le stong par bsgom //
T02D2213:201a-35: 'od gsal me yis sbyangs pa ste //
T02D2213:201a-36: de ltar du ni bsam zhes gsungs //
T02D2213:201a-37: ba thag phug nas thig le la ;
T02D2213:201a-38: / thim mo de la blo gtad pas //
T02D2213:201a-41: ba thag ces ni 'brel pa ste //
T02D2213:201a-44: snang ba lam du byed pa yin //
T02D2213:201a-45: snang ba thig le'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2213:201a-46: snang ba stong pa gcig tu thim ;
T02D2213:201a-47: / stong pa rang bzhin dngos de la //
T02D2213:201a-48: mi rtog pa yi blo gtad pas //
T02D2213:201a-49: mtha' 'das rang bzhin med pa ste //
T02D2213:201a-50: gang du yang ni grub pa med //
T02D2213:201a-51: brjod min rtog min lhan cig skyes //
T02D2213:201a-52: 'jug pa ba thag bzhi po yang //
T02D2213:201a-53: srid gsum 'joms pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2213:201b-0: stong pa ba @201b thag bzhi por thim //
T02D2213:201b-3: ba thag kun du brtags pa'o //
T02D2213:201b-4: bzhi bo yang ni tha dad med //
T02D2213:201b-5: skye ba rmi lam sring pa gsum //
T02D2213:201b-6: srid gsum zhes ni rab tu bshad //
T02D2213:201b-7: de rnams srid pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2213:201b-8: ro mnyam gcig tu rtogs pas so //
T02D2213:201b-9: stong pa ba thag bzhi por thim //
T02D2213:201b-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas lugs la //
T02D2213:201b-11: 'bras bu rtog pa'i stong nyid thim //
T02D2213:201b-12: ma la bu ni thim pa ste //
T02D2213:201b-13: rtog pa thams cad bcom pa'o //
T02D2213:201b-14: dbang po thig le med pa la //
T02D2213:201b-15: au ma chen bo dbyings nyid du //
T02D2213:201b-16: ye shes phra mo las kyis spro //
T02D2213:201b-20: rlung rkyang pa la sgom pa ste //
T02D2213:201b-21: dbang po thig le med pa la rtsa dang thig
T02D2213:201b-22: le mi sgom pa rlung rkyang pa la sgom pa
T02D2213:201b-23: ste / rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ba'i don no //
T02D2213:201b-24: rlung ni 'khor bar bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas //
T02D2213:201b-25: de rgyu lam du 'gro bar shes //
T02D2213:201b-26: rgyu lam 'bras bur rnam par bshad //
T02D2213:201b-27: yang dag don la dbye ba med //
T02D2213:201b-28: dbus ma aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D2213:201b-29: bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i gnas yin pas dbyings so //
T02D2213:201b-30: ye shes rlung g-yas g-yon spro ba'o //
T02D2213:201b-31: 'byung ba phyir 'byung ste h'um gi ngo bo'o //
T02D2213:201b-32: 'jug pa rlung nang du aom gyi ngo bo 'jug pa'o //
T02D2213:201b-33: phra ba ni rtog pa rags pa stong pa ste /
T02D2213:201b-34: gnas pa aa skye ba med pa'i don du bsgom ste /
T02D2213:201b-35: rlung ba thag dang 'dra ba de la brten pa'o //
T02D2213:201b-36: thun tshod ni skor bdun la sogs te /
T02D2213:201b-39: dbyu gu dang thun tshad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2213:201b-40: de la brten nas dngos grub 'byung ba'o //
T02D2213:201b-41: de la rtags 'byung ba yi don //
T02D2213:201b-42: rtags phyag rgya'i ye shes chen po thob par 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02D2213:201b-43: du ba smig rgyu srin bu me khyer mkhar snang rtags //
T02D2213:201b-44: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2213:201b-45: bde chen sku la sogs pa gnyis med 'byung //
T02D2213:201b-46: don rnams ma lus rdzogs par mdzad//
T02D2213:201b-47: 'di ni gang zag snod can las /
T02D2213:201b-48: shes pa bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba 'di gang zag snod can la bstan pa yin te /
T02D2213:201b-49: dad ldan nga rgyal med cing don la phyogs //
T02D2213:201b-50: brtson 'grus ldan zhing zab mo'i don la mos //
T02D2213:201b-51: bla ma la gus dge la rin chen rigs //
T02D2213:202a-2: gang zag tshul 'chos g-yo can rnams //
T02D2213:202a-3: gsang sngags phrag khyer dan song rgyu //
T02D2213:202a-4: de la sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D2213:202a-6: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag gis //
T02D2213:202a-7: bsgrubs na mkha' spyod la sogs pa //
T02D2213:202a-9: / tshul bzhin sgrub pa'i gang zag la //
T02D2213:202a-10: dngos grub klu mo mkha' 'gros ster //
T02D2213:202a-12: brgyud pa'i rim pa man ngag 'di bkod pas //
T02D2213:202a-13: tshig dang don la nyes pa shor srid na //
T02D2213:202a-14: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang //
T02D2213:202a-15: mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol /
T02D2213:202a-16: zhes gong ma rnams la bzod par gsol ba'i don te /
T02D2213:202a-17: blo gros rin chen la sogs bde gshegs mkha' 'gro rnams la'o //
T02D2213:202a-19: khengs ba rnyed pa bkur sti la sogs min //
T02D2213:202a-20: phyi rabs rtsod pa'i dus su sems can dngos grub 'byung //
T02D2213:202a-22: 'di brtsams pa yi bsod nams kyis //
T02D2213:202a-23: khams gsum sems can ma lus kun //
T02D2213:202a-24: rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa yongs spangs nas //
T02D2213:202a-25: yongs su dag pa'i sa thob shog / ces pa bsngo ba'i don te /
T02D2213:202a-26: sems can kun gyis spang bya rnams spangs nas //
T02D2213:202a-27: phyag rgya chen po'i sa thob par shog / ces pa'o //
T02D2213:202a-28: blo chung bdag gis brtsams par mi 'os te //
T02D2213:202a-29: dman mos sems can don gyi phyir //
T02D2213:202a-30: tshig dang don la nyes srid na //
T02D2213:202a-31: de nyid khyed rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02D2213:202a-32: bdag gis 'di brtsams bsod nams kyis //
T02D2213:202a-33: 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun //
T02D2213:202a-34: de nyid don ni rab rtogs shog / bdag kyang
T02D2213:202a-35: 'gro don byed par shog / klu'i byang chub kyi
T02D2213:202a-36: sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba
T02D2213:202a-38: / slob dpon n'a g'ardzu na zhes kyang bya /
T02D2213:202a-39: klu sgrub snying po zhes kyang bya /
T02D2213:202a-40: klu yi byang chub zhes kyang bya /
